description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦

歌曲介绍：

由Lady GaGa和RedOne共同撰写的《罗曼死》(Bad Romance)是收录于GaGa改版EP专辑《名利怪物》(The Fame Monster)中的首波主打单曲。其音乐录影带发布于YouTube上短短只有三个月，点击率已突破一亿大关，并引起全球模仿潮。直至2013年1月8日，该歌曲MV在影音网站YouTube的全球点击率已突破5.03亿次。

模唱歌词：

唱：I want your ugly
　　I want your disease
　　I want your everything
　　As long as it’s free
　　I want your love
　　Love-love-love
　　I want your love


　　I want you drama
　　The touch of your hand
　　I want your leather studded kiss in the sand
　　And I want your love
　　Love-love-love
　　I want your love
　　Love-love-love
　　I want your love


　说：You know that I want you
　　And you know that I need you
　　I want you bad
　　Your bad romance


　　唱：I want your love
　　And I want your revenge
　　You and me could write a bad romance
　　I want your love
　　All your love is revenge
　　You and me could write a bad romance


　　Oh-oh-oh-oh-oooh!
　　Oh-oh-oooh-oh-oh!
　　Caught in a bad romance
　　Oh-oh-oh-oh-oooh!
　　Oh-oh-oooh-oh-oh!
　　Caught in a bad romance

　　Rah-rah-ah-ah-ah!
　　Mum-mum-mum-mum-mah!
　　GaGa-oo-la-la!
　　Want your bad romance

title: 英文歌曲天天唱: Bad Romance

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

李代沫蹲,李代沫蹲完黄海波蹲,黄海波蹲,黄海波蹲完张元蹲,张元蹲,张元蹲完宁财神蹲,宁财神蹲,宁财神蹲完张耀扬蹲,张耀扬蹲,张耀扬蹲,张耀扬蹲完郭美美蹲,郭美美蹲,郭美美蹲,郭美美蹲完张默蹲,张默蹲,张默蹲完高虎蹲,高虎蹲,高虎蹲,高虎蹲完,房祖名和柯震东一起蹲,他们蹲完谁来蹲?

近来许多明星接连因为吸毒入狱，网上也刮起了一阵狂潮，支持的，挖苦的，讽刺的，各种声音不绝于耳。对于明星吸毒，无论背后有何故事，都是不应该的，应该说任何人都不应该吸毒。那么在你眼里，你怎么看待明星吸毒这件事情？

话题：

1. What's your opinion on those celebrities' taking drugs?

2. DIY one topic as you like, but do stick to the theme.
 

范例1：

In China, it is very hard to say that people in the show business are model citizens, so it takes no surprise that several famous stars are involved in the scandals of drug abuses. And I find it quite convenient that these people were always busted in Beijing, the capital near the north frontier with North Korea. Indeed, China has a long suffering history of drugs trafficking which can revert to the first Opium war in 1840. Now the Chinese government brags about its effectiveness and efficiency of cracking drug ring and busting the drug users, but it is shy of and even dodges the question who is the primary provider of drugs which inundate the north China. The answer is simple, it’s North Korea, our brother and comrade with whom we have a profound friendship clotted in the Korean War. How ironic, it is poisoning us. Perhaps, between us there’s no friendship, just mutual dependency and mutual poisoning between two kleptocracies.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文天天写：明星不断掉进毒坑

description:
Now Michael Schumacher's wife has urged members of the media to leave the hospital in Grenoble, where her husband is being treated for a head injury. The seven-times Formula One world champion remains in a medically-induced coma following a skiing accident ten days ago. Here's Corinna Schumacher's statement read by one of my BBC colleagues.

"Please support our shared fight with Michael. It's important to me that you take the pressure off the doctors and the hospital so they can do their work. Please have faith in their statements and leave the hospital. Please also leave our family in peace."

Well, since Michael Schumacher was admitted to hospital on December 29th, he's had two operations to remove blood clots and reduce swelling. Our sports news correspondent Richard Conway was part of the assembled media outside the hospital until last weekend.

A lot of people withdrew at the weekend as you said, but of course there is people still there - a lot of French journalists, a lot of German journalists, a lot of Italian journalists still there, wanting to know information. The family clearly not happy with this and have asked this, made this request that this is a very long process now for Michael Schumacher and it will be some days, some weeks, possibly even some months before we know exactly what his long-term prognosis is.

title: 舒马赫妻子请媒体离开医院（有声）

description:
Wherever you are in the UK, whatever brings you joy in food and drink, there's a category in these awards you can make a real difference to. And over the next three weeks, you'll have an opportunity to share with our judges the food stories that matter to you. So in this programme we'll set the scene. We'll hear from some of the judges and the backdrop to the categories in 2014. Our first stop, the high street where the future role of food is a subject of urgent debate.
I'm not the saviour of the high street. I cannot do this on my own. I'm a champion of it. I do this because I believe in it. I believe in high streets and I believe that they're important, social infrastructure and part of our communities and this country.
When retail expert Mary Portas appeared before MPs in September, she restated her belief that food will have a big role to play in keeping our high streets alive. Around the same time, a wave of reports had been published, highlighting the extent of the crisis in many town centres, increasing shop closures, declining footfall. In December, the government announced a 1-billion-pound package of support for high streets, all important context for one of the most popular categories in the Food and Farming Awards - Best Local Food Retailer, which for more than a decade, has shown what difference a great food shop can make.

title: 预算之争 重回视线(1/2)

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于通过数学模型帮助鲸鱼避开夺命船只的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

CONTENT：
The unique Sri Lankan blue whales live in busy shipping waters. Marine biologist Asha de Vos is using mathematical models to put them out of harm's way
You advocate using mathematical models to prevent Sri Lankan whales being killed by ship strikes. How big a problem is this?
Ship strikes are a well known cause of mortality for all types of whales everywhere. But Sri Lanka is in the top 0.2 per cent for global shipping traffic. In 2012, a blue whale was found wrapped around the bow of a container ship that came into Colombo, Sri Lanka's main international port. Days later we found another carcass floating at sea with gashes from a ship. But for every whale that is found, at least 10 go unseen because the carcasses sink or get pushed out to sea. Collecting evidence of this problem is pretty challenging.
What's special about Sri Lankan blue whales?
They are a unique subspecies of pygmy blue whale. At 25 metres long, they're about 5 metres shorter than the Antarctic blue whale. Also, unlike other blue whales, they don't migrate to the poles to feed but stay largely in the northern Indian Ocean. They also speak a very different dialect. These whales rely on the area around Sri Lanka for breeding, calving and feeding. I am interested in finding out why, what sustains them and how important the area is to their survival.
 
REFERENCE：
http://www.newscientist.com/article/mg22329760.300-im-modelling-whale-ways-to-keep-them-safe-from-ships.html#.U8Sd7bF6EWo
【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

这种独特的斯里兰卡蓝鲸生活在繁忙的航运水域。海洋生物学家亚莎运用数学模型帮助蓝鲸避开危险水域。
您致力于采用数学模型保护斯里兰卡鲸鱼免受船只碰撞？这过程有什么难题吗？
众所周知与轮船撞击是导致各地鲸鱼死亡的原因之一。而斯里兰卡的航运占全球的前0.2%。2012年一艘集装箱船驶入斯里兰卡最主要的国际港口科伦坡，人们发现一头蓝鲸死在这艘船的船头附近。几天过后我们发现另一头带有与船只碰伤的伤口的鲸鱼尸体浮在海面上。除了这些被发现的鲸鱼尸体外，还有至少十头鲸鱼的尸体是没有被发现的，要么沉入了海底，要么被冲出了海域。要收集这方面的证据对我们来说是一个巨大的挑战。
斯里兰卡蓝鲸有什么特别的？
他们是侏儒蓝鲸的一个独特的分支。一般有25米长，他们比南极蓝鲸短了约5米。另外与其他蓝鲸不同的是他们不会迁徙到两极生活而是大量留在北印度洋。它们之间交流的语言也不一样。这些蓝鲸在斯里兰卡周围的海域繁殖，哺育后代以及觅食。我想找出它们留在这里的原因，到底有什么支撑它们留在这里，这片海域对他们的生存来说有多重要。

description:

模仿文本：In recent days, violence betweencivilian groupshas increased. Christians reported that their religious centers were attacked on Thursday. Some Egyptians raided and set fire to two government offices in Giza, a city across the Nile River from Cairo. Government employee Fehmi Hassan says the attackers were supporters of the ousted president.

译文：最近，平民组织之间的暴力活动也有所增加。基督徒报告称，他们的宗教中心周四遭遇袭击。一些埃及人袭击并放火烧了与开罗一河（尼罗河）之隔的吉莎的两间政府办公室。政府雇员费尔米·哈桑表示袭击者是被罢免总统的支持者。

groups \ˈgrüp\
Christian \ˈkris-chən, ˈkrish-\
Egyptian \i-ˈ jip-shən\

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Junekaname

22秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

Destroying ancient shrines and mosques, ISIS is trying to eradicate every trace of Islamic tradition. It's probably even more oppressive than the Taliban world in Afghanistan. In power, ISIS resembles a 20th century to territory in state more than any type of traditional rule.
